extension.summary: [COLOR lime]Installer to teach Diamomd not to overwrite addons in other repositories without permission[/COLOR]
extension.description: Not a Video Add-On, it just fixes Diamomd's mistake for overwriting MetalliQ 4Qed with higher version. Do not support people such as Diamond Builds. You may remove this now, thank you.
extension.disclaimer: The owners and submitters to this repository do not host or distribute any of the content displayed by these addons nor do they have any affiliation with the content providers.
